name: Ribbon Dive
description:
Ribbon Dive is a quick, difficult, high score game with a low poly aesthetic. Inspired by SF Cave, Super Hexagon, and Flappy Bird. The design and programming was done by Robinson Farrar. The modular music composition was created by Jared Burrell.

How to play:

  • Press space or the mouse button to rise and let go to fall. 
  • Every time you begin to rise you consume a resource (see bottom left).
  • Collect rings to score and gain resources to stay alive.

Android builds will be available promptly after completing some graphics debugging.
